name: Bitter Peak
description:
Climb the Bitter Mountain. Reach the Bitter Peak.

Made for GBJAM 9

[ IF THE CONTROLS DO NOT WORK, TRY CLICKING INSIDE THE GAME WINDOW]

Controls:

WASD or D-Pad: Move

Double Tap WASD or direction: Dodge

J,K or A,B or X,O: Action

M - toggle music

Music by @luketylermp

Sounds by AdamAudio
